description.en: Black Market Gaming is a peer to peer platform that allows users to buy, sell and trade in game gear and services amongst each other in exchange for the platform utility token, BMG. the BMG platform initially began as a peer to peer forum designed to facilitate interaction and token transferring capabilities amongst users. Over time BMG will add its own NFT trading card game, “CARNAGE” as well as its own sub-sections for remote services such as development work, editing, design and other jobs performed remotely. All of these things and more powered by our utility token, BMG.
